blogs.title: My First Blog
blogs.body:
Why do we use it?
It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English. Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search for 'lorem ipsum' will uncover many web sites still in their infancy. Various versions have evolved over the years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on purpose (injected humour and the like).


Where does it come from?
Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of the word in classical literature, discovered the undoubtable source. Lorem Ipsum comes from sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" (The Extremes of Good and Evil) by Cicero, written in 45 BC. This book is a treatise on the theory of ethics, very popular during the Renaissance. The first line of Lorem Ipsum, "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..", comes from a line in section 1.10.32.

The standard chunk of Lorem Ipsum used since the 1500s is reproduced below for those interested. Sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 from "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" by Cicero are also reproduced in their exact original form, accompanied by English versions from the 1914 translation by H. Rackham.

Where can I get some?
There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words which don't look even slightly believable. If you are going to use a passage of Lorem Ipsum, you need to be sure there isn't anything embarrassing hidden in the middle of text. All the Lorem Ipsum generators on the Internet tend to repeat predefined chunks as necessary, making this the first true generator on the Internet. It uses a dictionary of over 200 Latin words, combined with a handful of model sentence structures, to generate Lorem Ipsum which looks reasonable. The generated Lorem Ipsum is therefore always free from repetition, injected humour, or non-characteristic words etc.
blogs.author: mario

blogs.author: yoshi

facts.fact: The Eiffel Tower can grow taller in the summer.
Wombat poop is cube-shaped.
Honey never spoils.
Sharks existed before trees.
There’s a species of jellyfish that is biologically immortal.
Bananas are berries, but strawberries aren’t.
A day on Venus is longer than a year on Venus.
Octopuses have three hearts.
Water can boil and freeze at the same time under the right conditions.
The heart of a blue whale is as heavy as a small car.
A group of flamingos is called a 'flamboyance'.
Sloths can hold their breath longer than dolphins.
The shortest war in history lasted 38 to 45 minutes.
Cows have best friends and get stressed when separated.
There is a McDonald's on every continent except Antarctica.
Butterflies can taste with their feet.
The unicorn is Scotland’s national animal.
Your bones are about five times stronger than steel.
The longest hiccuping spree lasted 68 years.
A single lightning bolt is five times hotter than the surface of the sun.
A bolt of lightning contains enough energy to toast 100,000 slices of bread.
Hot water freezes faster than cold water under certain conditions.
Cleopatra lived closer in time to the Moon landing than to the construction of the Great Pyramid.
The world's largest desert is actually Antarctica.
Astronauts' height can increase by up to 2 inches in space.
The human body contains about 37.2 trillion cells.
The smell of freshly-cut grass is actually a plant distress signal.
A day on Mars is only about 40 minutes longer than a day on Earth.
Giraffes only need 5 to 30 minutes of sleep per day.
Jellyfish have survived five mass extinctions.
The world's oldest known joke is from 1900 BC and is about flatulence.
You can't hum while holding your nose.
An octopus can squeeze through any hole larger than its beak.
The average cloud weighs about 1.1 million pounds.
Bananas share about 50% of their DNA with humans.
The inventor of the frisbee was turned into a frisbee after he died.
A day on Mercury lasts longer than a year on Mercury.
There’s a basketball court on the top floor of the U.S. Supreme Court building.
A cockroach can live for weeks without its head.
The 'M’s in M&M’s stand for Mars and Murrie.
A shrimp’s heart is in its head.
Vending machines kill more people per year than sharks.
Pineapples take about two years to grow.
The inventor of the matchstick was originally trying to create a new medicine.
There's a small island in Japan that is entirely overrun by rabbits.
It rains diamonds on Jupiter and Saturn.
Tigers have striped skin, not just striped fur.
The first recorded pizza delivery was in 1889.
Cows produce more milk when they listen to relaxing music.
There is a species of fungus that turns ants into 'zombies'.
